ideas.title: The Imperial Nothingburger
ideas.premise: The Emperor is holding a press conference, but the only news he announces is that he had a particularly nice cup of matcha.
ideas.why_funny: Subverts expectations with the Emperor relaying totally unimportant 'news'.

ideas.title: Diet Meeting Debacle
ideas.premise: A politician in a Diet meeting in Nagatacho reports 'breaking news': his bento box contained an extra pickle.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at the often mundane nature of political reporting and procedure.

ideas.title: Yurakucho News Stand Still
ideas.premise: A newsstand vendor in Yurakucho is utterly bored, because literally nothing newsworthy has happened all day.
ideas.why_funny: Relatability of boredom, exaggerated by the vendor's profession.

ideas.title: Giant Robot's Day Off
ideas.premise: The life-size Gundam in Odaiba (viewable from Chiyoda) announces it's taking a 'news sabbatical' because it's tired of the same old news.
ideas.why_funny: Humorous anthropomorphism, Gundam acting as a news anchor.

ideas.title: Akihabara Static
ideas.premise: All the screens in Akihabara display only static, representing the complete lack of news and overwhelming digital noise.
ideas.why_funny: Visual gag contrasting Akihabara's usual sensory overload with absolute nothingness.
